entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:45 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
